function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of awareness about specific roles and responsibilities","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited knowledge sharing and interaction between colleagues","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of recognition and appreciation in the workplace may lead to decreased motivation and job satisfaction.","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective communication and engagement initiatives may lead to emotional repercussions and anxiety among employees.","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restriction of team building and group engagement activities due to social distancing norms","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Offsite employees unable to express and share their stories and experiences","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emotional fragility of team members leading to decreased productivity and performance","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental health crisis leading to anxiety, burnout, and other serious conditions among employees","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication and understanding of workplace rules","category":"Communication and Messaging","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication about policies & protocols leading to confusion and non-compliance.","category":"Communication and Messaging","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Feelings of loneliness and gratitude among employees affecting mental health and well-being.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prioritizing higher-level employee needs without adequately addressing physiological, safety, and social needs may lead to decreased employee well-being and performance.","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High employee engagement and satisfaction levels may lead to complacency and reduced vigilance in maintaining health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emotional support and engagement with employees","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate employee engagement, learning, and development measures","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate alternatives for mass religious gatherings","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community-led development practices may
